name: 白俊恩
objective:
本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
schedule:
WED 1-3 TOEIC
Week 1 TED Talk – Do schools Kill Creativity? Vis-à-vis standardized tests; Video: Bart the Genius; Intro to the class – organization, grading, overview of TOEIC and TOEIC grading policies
Week 2 Essay 1, Paragraph Reading
Week 3 Essay 2, feedback on essay 1, Paragraph Reading
Week 4 Writer's Options (pdf); sentence-combining 1
Week 5 Sentence-combining 2, feedback on sentence combining 1, Paragraph Reading
Week 6 Sentence-combining 3, feedback on sentence combining 2, Paragraph Reading
Week 7 Sentence-combining 4, feedback on sentence combining 3, Paragraph Reading
Week 8 Essay 3
Week 9 MIDTERM EXAM
Week 10 Reading Comprehension Single Passages 1
Week 11 Reading Comprehension Single Passages 2
Week 12 Reading Comprehension Multiple Passages 1
Week 13 Reading Comprehension Multiple Passages 2
Week 14 Text Completion 1
Week 15 Text Completion 2
Week 16 Incomplete Sentences 1
Week 17 Incomplete Sentences 1
Week 18 FINAL EXAM + SELF-EVALUATION
NOTE: Schedule subject to change pending Fall 2019 holidays
